live_giveaways.title: Warframe Booster Pack
live_giveaways.description: Get your Warframe Booster Pack and unlock free in-game items to enhance your gaming experience!
live_giveaways.instructions: Sign up on the game's official website and redeem the code.

live_giveaways.title: Among Us: MIRA HQ Skins Bundle
live_giveaways.description: Claim your free MIRA HQ Skins Bundle for Among Us! Play with the latest skins and enhance your gaming sessions!
live_giveaways.instructions: Download Among Us from the official store and use the code to unlock the bundle.

live_giveaways.title: Epic Games Store Weekly Free Game
live_giveaways.description: Epic Games Store releases a free game every week! Be sure to check out this week's free game and add it to your library!
live_giveaways.instructions: Create an account at Epic Games Store and download the game for free.

live_giveaways.title: League of Legends: Free Champion Rotation
live_giveaways.description: League of Legends offers a weekly rotation of free champions. Try out new champions without spending any Blue Essence!
live_giveaways.instructions: Log into your League of Legends account and check the champions rotation tab.
